solution_line_template: The cost of {hamburger_qty} pieces of hamburger is ${hamburger_price} x {hamburger_qty} = $<<{hamburger_price}*{hamburger_qty}={hamburger_total}>>{hamburger_total}.
The cost of {fries_qty} sets of French fries is ${fries_price} x {fries_qty} = $<<{fries_price}*{fries_qty}={fries_total}>>{fries_total}.
The cost of {soda_qty} cups of soda is ${soda_price} x {soda_qty} = $<<{soda_price}*{soda_qty}={soda_total}>>{soda_total}.
Hence, each of the five friends will contribute ${total_bill}/{num_friends} = $<<{total_bill}/{num_friends}={per_person}>>{per_person}.
